case.state: You slags down for a cheeky wee bit o' strip poker or what?
Alright, cunts, who's up for a cheeky wee bit o' strip poker to~background.time~?
Honk if Thatcher's dead!
Why dae folk ask stupid shite like "Ayeyo mate is this strip poker? No way!" As if yon cunt's gonna follow up like "Ah feck I had no idea I jus' came here for the cheeky banter!"
By the by, if you weren't sure, at the end'a the game y've gotta have a cheeky little wank sesh. I cannae believe people come here and dunnae knoo it.
Well? Had a gander at mah arse yet, folks? It'll dae some good fir ye health.
Take a long gander at ma bahookie, folks. It'll do yer health some good.
... Nah, nae cards swapped.
No, but thank ye fer the offer.
I'll be fine 'n' dandy wit what ah've got here.
Nah, I'll keep do with what I have.
I'll just shimmy on over an' grab ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'm choosin' ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
I dun have a scooby what I'm doin', jus' give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, right quick.
Alright, pal. Just gimme ~cards.text~ an' it'll be nae bother.
If you had the chance ta change yer cards... would ya?
If I ask ya nicely, can you swing things in ma favour?
Ya know what I find really attractive? Givin' me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Maybe... Nah.
I've got half a mind ta... nope, I've jus' got half a mind.
Jus' a few more, pal.
Two... No, four! ... Nah, gimmie two aft'r all.
Gimmie ~cards.text~ of yer best cards, bright 'n' early!
Swap me oot ~cards.text~, if ye please.

Why dae people care how long these feckin' lines are for swappin' cards? Like, d'ya really think I give a hoot aff how long it takes ye to read what I'm sayin'? If ya really wanna stop ta read swappin' cards lines, then more power to ye, but don't go askin' me to shut ma gob jus' 'cause yer hankerin' for rich and enlightenin' dialogue in ever single thing I holler at ye. And if yew happen ta report this line, I'll come wide at ye with me foot goin' straight up yer backside!
Oo aye, I've got a braw hand now, folks.
Ah bet ya wish ya had luck as good as mine!
Fancy yourself a good hand there, pal? Mind if I share?
Aye right, aye right. Whate'er you s-- Ooh! I've got a good chance this time.
Oh, you cunts are in fer a show, now.
You folks just wannae give up now, or what?

Why dae folk ask Pokémon stupid shite like "You're getting strong aren't ye?"
As if the wee cunt's gony be like "Aye Moira yer spot on, I'm oan the expay shaer."
It's bloody fatal tae ask if your family are spoonin' for a cuppa tea. Starts as a polite offer an suddenly it's like you've clocked in fer a shift at the Battle Café.
Trying a new chippy an' it being shite is honestly worse than heartbreak. Not only have you betrayed yer normal chippy, now you've got a naff dinner.
I dunno what I'm doing!
Anybody wantae play darts after this? Ah've got a mean throwin' hand.
If ah mak' curry, 'n' it has nae flavour tae it... A whole bag's worth o' salt willnae dae it any good.
Are ye pure worried that a'm gonnae win? Fer real? Me?
Oh! I only filled out ma Curry Dex th' other day. I'd forgotten t' just make a plain `pasta curry'. Was drivin' me up th' wall!
Ah've got better things to do than wait around for you to take yer sweet time swappin' the wee cards.
Ah'm bored out ma skull over here. C'mon, already!

Saw a lad fall arse over tit down a couple of stairs, and his mates just stopped an' asked if he was okay. What kinda mutant bastard d'ya have to be to not piss yerself laughing when yer friend's in physical pain?
It's mental how ye need to apologise fer not smoking when someone asks fer a lighter. Aye, sorry mate, I'm no inhaling the sweet tar intae me lungs today.
Even tho I've a Galarian accent, I still have tae put on a Galarian accent when I have tae say "There's been a myurrrderrr!"
Seen anythin' good on the telly lately? I've nae been keepin' up with Turffield Abbey, an' me mum keeps tryin' tae share spoilers wit' me.
Ah know they lik' tae relax in Alola, but kin ye hurry up already?
Ah hear curry is wild popular in Kanto, tae. Is that right?
How'm ah meant tae brag about havin' a legendary Pokémon when a'm aroond folk who dinnae have a scooby what a Pokémon is?
Ah. This'll be nae bother at all.
Hmm... I cannae say ah've played much poker.
Well, come on, then! Swap yer cards, mate!
Are ye feelin' pure 'n' well, then?
I nae have much chance this round. Still, could be worse.
Nae e'en worth commentin' oan.
Kinda wish I had a bottle o' Bru aboot now.
I was ne'er good at judgin' averages.
Ah'm I bovvered? Nae chance, pal!
Champion o' Galar, goin' tae-- ah, wait, nae mind.
Oi! Dun fall asleep now!
Critical... er, it's nae a hit. Critical average?
Do ye fancy yer chances this time, mate? Go on, then.
Ah... I cannae focus like this. Ah've got too much exposed teet.
... Ack, I was jus' daydreamin' again. Sorreh.
... Is this workin'? Ye scared, yet?
Whats wrong with ye, ~player~?
Ye ever wanty just wrap yersel up in tin foil, nice and cosy, and then just fuckin' get right inty the microwave and blow yersel up tae fuck an' back? 'Cause that's how bad ma luck is.
D'you knoo what yer meant ta do when y've got Wooloo tramplin' around on yer roof in the wee hours of the morn'? Cause I don't have a ken.
Oi! Wot didya say 'bout me maw, ya jessie oaf-lookin' scooner?!
Ahhhh-hhaaa. Ah could do wit' a cuppa tea. Or maybe a wee bit o' whisky. Actually, forget that last bit. It's too soon tae be drinkin'.
I wonder if there's such a thing as a "Tea Dex." I mean, someone went ahead 'n' made a whole Curry Dex, right? Why no a Tea Dex ta go with it?
Ah, cripe. This ain't doin' me any favours.
I need more Irn Bru if I'm ta handle this.
I should've known better. Bah.
I cannae ken what ta do with these...
It's feckin' colder than the Crown Tundra out here! th' the bloody hell set this game up?
I dunno, but I didja year abou' the one called Ligma?
If y' want tae go fer th' straightforward approach, jus' say in simple terms, "Hey pal, a'm in desperate need o' someone tae rearrange mah downstairs. Fancy a go?"
Give a guy a good tease an' he'll be like clay in yer hands. Trus' me, men are easy if yer jus' on the straight and narrow with 'em.
"I may be stupid"? Darn right, ya numpty. Who tha fock comes inta strip poker thinkin' it's Uno?
Ah dunno if I'd want tae get knocked up so early. I dunnae want tae haveta tie m'self down with a wee tyke.
I mean, ah'm oan the pill b'cause I dunnae want tae get preggers so young. I'm noo ready tae be a mum jus' yet.
Ooh, Flutters! Ah could introduce ya t' Zacian. She's a wild ol' dug, an' she carries a mean sword in her mouth. Cool, innit?
Ooh! You'll catch me goin' absolutely mental fer a good curry!
... Sly, d'ya mind keepin' yer wee pal under control, perhaps?
Oo aye, ye kin buy me a round at th' pub after this.
If yer man's feelin' awful hungry, cook him a pasta curry. Nothin' fills yer stomach quite like a few spoonfulls of both a' them.
Ah dun' drink fer the taste, I drink t' get pished as fast as possible. I'll nev'r pass on a good whisky, tho'.
I could start callin' ya "Special K", but that'll make it seem like people want ta scarf ya down first thing in the mornin'.
Mari... I dunno if ye noticed, but I'm tryin' tae jill myself o'er here. I cannae think about curry right noo.
Mari... I dunno if ye noticed, but I'm tryin' tae jill myself o'er here. I cannae think about havin' a drink right noo.
This one's fer you, Yuno! Wait... Was ah meant tae look at mah cards there? Hell.
A'right, fine. Ye ken keek at mah arse, Yuno. Wait... Hold yer horses, did ye already deal? Ah, bugger.
Enjoy yer meal, Zorc.
... Was ah meant tae look at mah cards there? Hell.
... Hold yer horses, did ye already deal? Ah, bugger.
Bloody hell, it feel lik' a've been in th' nude fer a while now.
Hell's bells, a've been standing 'ere stark nude fer a while, haven't I?
Och aye, they're absolutely grand t' be around. Ah mean, Hop is... I hope ah'm not talkin' about them too much, now.
Oo, aye! Ye cannae go wrong wit' the Plenty-of-Potato curries if that's what yer after. But somethin' tells me ye'd also enjoy the Fried-Food curry, too!
Hold on there, lass. Whit are ye sayin', that ah sound lik' an auld woman?
Ah think ah've met someone's aunt called "Slantheav". They're noo from Ballonlea, are they?
"Slantheav"... They're noo from Ballonlea, perchance? I think ah knoo someone's aunt from there named Slantheav.
Och aye, they're absolutely grand t' be around! Ah've got ma buddy Hop, fer example. He always goes aboot with a smile on his face, e'en over the dumbest shite!
Ah could give ye a list a' things I like tae do, like I'm lookin' fer a speed date. Let's see... Ah'm big on the outdoors. Campin' out in the Wild Area is pure class.
We'll jus' about deep fry anythin' ya want. Pizza, burgers, cream eggs... hell, we'll e'en deep fry caramel chocolate bars, if ya want.
Ah've had it fer a while. Ah've noo grown much since ah got it, so it still fits me jus' fine. Had tae fix a few buttons here 'n' there, but it's still good.
What're ye on about, lass? I'm nae bein' haunted by some wee spectre, am I?
Ya what, lass? I'm noo bein' visited by some poltergeist, am I noo?
What're ye talking aboot? Ah'm speaking perfectly clearly. Ye'r nae gonnae act like the stupid voice activated things 'n' claim ye cannae ken mah accent, are ye?
Hmm... Ah dunno. Ah dinnae pure have a "thing" like yer describing. Ah suppose ah dae have a fondness fur curry? But that's nae pure strange.
Whit's this aboot magic, then? Ah'm speaking howfur ah normally dae. It's nae lik' ah'm speaking another language or anythin' fancy.
Oh, fur sure! Ah started mah adventure wi' mah old pal Hop tagging along. He's a'right, but he always gets pure excited o'er every single thing we see when we're oot 'n' aboot.
I'm nae fuckin' Irish, pal. 'N' where dae ye think ye'r standin', tellin' me that mah voice sounds like crap?
Nae that's funny, ah cannae place your accent. Ah hope ah'm nawet tae incomprehensible tae ye.
Surely if ye'r a bunch o' folks livin' oan different planets er somethin', yer accents should hae drifted a wee bit? Dae ye all sound th' same?
C'mon, tis nae like ah'm an alien or somethin'. A'm hardly speakin' gibberish, am I? Plus, aren't ye that pure weird lassie folk blather on aboot?
Ah'm noo speakin' pure gobbledygook, am I? It's nae like ah'm an alien or somethin'. Plus, ah hear yer pretty weird yerself, right?
It's "glaw-ree-uh"! It's nae difficult ta say. It's noo like ah'm named somethin' like... I dunno, somethin' wrong.
Are you takin' the piss, mate?
Are you havin' a go at me? I'll chew yer arms off, ya daft cunt!
Oi, pal. You are no longer safe from me. Take fer the hills while you can.
Do you honestly think this is fuckin' funny, mate?
Ah, well. Cannae expect ta win perfectly, can I?
Can't win 'em all, as they say.
Figured I'd give ya a right good chance at a fair victory, aye?
Can't win 'em all, as they say.
Oh no, yer gonna get a look at ma teets. What am I gonna do?
Fer real, ye were lookin' forward to this, aye?
Alrigh', gonna get a move on.
Nae bother, nae bother.
Ooh, I'm in fer a rough fight now. Intit just so?
Without my hat, how're you meant ta knoo I'm from Galar?
I've got no clue what I'm doin', to be honest wit ya.
Oop! I'm aff my heed to~background.time~.
Aye mate, no problem. Jus' made myself out ta be an eejit again.
Was gettin' ta see my teets no good enough for ya? Aight, fair.
It's nae my fault it's pure baltic out here! I can barely hold ma cards. I've got fingers like fish fingers straight from th' freezer!
Off to a fantastic start, aren't I? Ah, well.
Mhm. Okay, pal.
Ah, bolt ya rocket! I can't be havin' it like this.
Mhm.
I just can't be havin' this. Bloody hell.
Gah... fuckity bye ta my last chance ta spare my girls from a stiff breeze.
Next time this'll go a different way. You'll see.

... Then ah made real good wi' this lassie, Marnie - well, she was actually mah rival first off. We had a couple o' fights t'gether, but in the end she's real chummy wi' me. We hang oot all th' time, now.
A'right, noo yer th' one who's makin nae sense. Just whit are ye talkin' about?
Oh fer feck sake. "It's a pleasure tae meet ye, lassy." There, does that mak' ye happy?
Bloody hell. I cannae say ya earned this fair 'n' square or nothin'.
Yeah, yeah. You slags wanna gander at ma tits, I knoo.
No sympathy fer a girl losin' her knickers? Fer shame.
Ma socks are practically welded to ma boots at this point. Nae point tryin' to peel 'em aff.
Who wants ta have a go walkin' through muddy grass, day an' night, huntin' fer shiny Pokémon?
Oi, I'll tell ya wot. I'll give ya a two-fer-one offer on ma boots 'n' ma socks. Why nawt, right?
Don't go puttin' yer grubby mits on ma bonnet, got it?
Ya knoo the best part 'a gettin' to start a Pokémon journey? Not havin' ta listen ta what yer parents say all day.
Best part 'a gettin' to start ma Pokémon journey is campin' out in the wilds. I got ta make all the curry I wanted, too. Nae bad!
By the by, ahm sorry if I say anythin' that cuts a bit too deep. I'm only takin' the mickey outa ye.
Sorry if a'm tae mean tae ye at any point, a'm only muckin' about.
Ah could say that ye earned this fair 'n' square, but ah dinnae want ta be a liar.
'Twas getting a bit toasty fur me anyway, so this'll dae me just fine.
You slags wanna catch a view 'a my baps, or what? Gowan, be honest.
It's nae like I'm hidin' huge baps under this thing, but I'll give ya a show all the same!
A'right, loves. Yer gettin' a vew of me cunt, noo knickers in th' way. Dunnae make a big deal about it, alright?
I feel so incredibly hot fer yew all right now that I cannae help myself but drop ma knickers right here 'n now! Psh.
placeholder
placeholder
placeholder
Ah dunnae think a translation will be needed. Ah lik' tae think ah'm direct enough.
Oi! Pay attention tae whit ah'm saying, you eejit! Ah'm hardly speakin' in tongues!
Yeah, yeah. Take a gander at my bod' all ye like. Can we jus' move on with ourselves?
Well, here ye go. Probably nae goin' tae last very long like this, but whit kin ye do?
Ah'm nae happy aboot this one bit. Kiss my arse!
You "guess"? What're you guessing, ~opp.ifMale(lad|lass)~? Ah've taken off mah ~clothing~, what is there tae "guess?"
I cannae recommend gettin' both yer nips pierced. Hurts like a bugger and nearly busted how my teets feel. Only dun one ta try an' impress ma friend, Marnie.
Tried ta get my nips pierced to be cool like ma friend, Marnie. Hurt like hell an' ah couldn't go through wit gettin' the second one done.
Alright, that's oot a th' way! I can finally let ma toes rest on the ~background.surface~!
If yer intae toes, I cannae judge ya. I'll be hoopin' and hoolerin' at the sight of workin' man's fingers, after all. What's the difference?
How'd you figure I'd look with a balmoral, eh? Could nae be worse.
Ooh, wouldja lookat that? Ya have unrestricted access to ma hair! Pure madness.
Trying tae git to th' next toon when it starts ta pour wit' rain is awfly pernicketie. Especially when ye fall in a puddle and splash yerself.
Maybe if yer lucky next round, you'll get ta see ma tummy. Is that what yer intae, ya numpty?
What's wrong? Hopin' fer a peek up ma dress? Nae chance o' that, pal.
It's nae like I really care if ya see what I hide ma unmentionables with. Take a gander if ya like.
Well? Come on, then. Who wants ta have a go?
I'll give ya fair warning, ~player.ifMale(pal|lass)~; if I lose this whole thing, ya may not be able t' handle me.
D'ya knoo what? Bein' nude is th' Beedrill's knees! I could dae this all ~background.time~!
Alright, I'll take a swing; what's the damage wit that wee fella on yer shoulder, pal?
So is that blindfold part of yer style or wot? Are ya actually blind with it?
Noo surprise there that the boy from Kalos is th' one dressin' up like a puss.
Ah, you're a photographer, aye? Make sure ya get ma good side wit' yer camera, mate!
Ain't yew part of that there team from Unova? What were it called... Plas-ma?
Ah'm not in some sorta furry convention again, ah'm I?
So, is "Twisted" really yer firs' name? Or is that jus' yer stage persona?
Ugh! Ah, sorry, I mean... ugh! What kinda greasey speck are you meant ta be, "Guzma"?
Get off with ye. Aren't you one of them folks from Unova? Didn't ya win the championship a while back?
Ae ye'r a cute wee paintin' laddie, right? Do'ya paint people or places?
Ya look like ye could bench press a small school bus full 'o weans. What's yer secret?
Man alive, ya look like ye could go toe-to-toe wit' a Machamp an' come out on top. What's yer secret, Sonny Jim?
Do'ya think ye could keep the noise down a level? I cannae think if ye keep yellin'.
Ye look like ye'v been in a few rumbles in the pub. What's yer deal, jimmy?
So, do ya ever get mad at someone fer pickin' the wrong kind of favourite flower? Like, are ye ever all "Ye cannae jus' pick a daisy as yer favourite one! Daisies are bloody everywhere!"
Alright, pal. No need to go off yer maw about it.
C'mon, ya numpty. Ye can do it!
Aye, this'll be decent. Don't make this a chore, mate.
If ya don't scoot along, I'll just pop off to tha shops while we all wait, aye?
We're all here ta see tha same thing, aye? Don't freak oot about it.
Ah, go on yourself, wee man!
Welcome back, Dawn. Are th' two of you ready t' be gae togeth'r, or what?
Are yew really gonna play a game with yer mum at th' same table?
Didja not listen tae a word ah said earlier? Cripe...
Alright, I can already ken from the way ye dress that yer some kinda scientist. Y'ain't workin' on anythin' Dynamax related, are ye?
So yer a wee STEM lass, are ye? I can tell from the way ye dress. You aren't thinkin' of doin' anything with Dynamax power, are ye?
Ugh. I'm no in the mood ta deal with a Ghost-Type trainer today. Ya, pal, we get it, yer all spooky an' shite. I'm jus' surprised ya ain't dressed in all purple ta go with it.
Wait, so if yer lesbi-ghost pals had ta learn how ta have ghostly gae sex... Why didn't ya just look it up on yer phone?
Are the lights on upstair, love? They're on all over yerself, but ye don't seem ta be the most clever girl in the class.
I'm nae much of a gamer, myself. You're one of them... console lassies, right?
Alright, lass. Where'd ye grab the chips from? I'm feelin' a mite peckish, too.
The champion o' Sinnoh herself? Ah, this'll be a breeze. Yer Pokémon skills are noo good here, are they?
Ah, great. Yer one of those 'team' nutters ah've heard about. I dun care about volanoes or whatever.
Ah, great. Yer one of those 'team' nutters ah've heard about. Listen, I donate t' th' ocean clean up charity. I dun need more o' this.
So... Should ah be worried that I'm playin 'gainst a weirdo with a mask?
I always wanted tae go on holiday tae Hoenn. Are the beaches really swell?
D'ya think there're so many Water-Type Gym Leaders because Water-Type Pokémon are bloody everywhere?
I've nae got a thing fer mums... but maybe I can be convinced otherwise.
So what's yer deal, Moon? Yer an Alolan island lass, right?
Ah've got an idea of how ye can spice up yer food, lass. There's this thing called Gigantamix. Ah use it in ma curry all th' time, makes it huge.
So what's yer story, lass? Did ye jus' come here from after school club or what?
Nev'r seen a green Impidimp before. Or are ya just a regular kind ah... goblin-y thing?
So... Ach, I dunnae knoo how ta make small talk with ye. I cannae just ask wh't the weather's like in yer realms, can I?
Ah take back what I said earlier 'bout yer mask. You were hidin' a cute wee face under there. I could jus' squeeze ya.
So ye'r training tae be a professor, right? That's usually a family business, innit? Are ye workin' for yer da or somethin'?
So... Have ye come back ta planet Earth tae see how a fella's whole kit works in action, or what? Y'know, down there.
Let's see... Yer from anoth'r world, aye? Curious tae see how a fella's whole setup works downstairs, or what?

Ah suppose tae ye there's nee a thing out o' the' ordinary about havin' two mums. Tho', do yer mums do an equal share o' the love? Or does one handle the weeans, an' the other goes out tae do the work and earn the dough?

If yer from a world with all women, then there's noo a thing strange aboot havin' two mums, yeah? But I wanna knoo... Do yer folk pick a side, so tae speak? Like, does one mum do all the love, and the other does all th' work?
Ah've met ma fair share o' Psychic-Type trainers on ma journeys, so ah'm noo afraid of fightin' you.
Alright, ah'm gettin' an idea of what ye'r aboot. Tell me, lass, what's the biggest thing you've e'er stolen from someone?
Do ya e'er see yerself settlin' doon? Givin' up the adventurer life an' livin' nice and cozy with a pile of gold? Do adventurers git retirement benefits?
Alright, hen. No need to go off yer maw about it.
C'mon, ya bonnie lass. Ye can do it!
Aye, this'll be decent. Should wipe that smirk off yer maw.
If ye take much longer to do this, I'll be off ta do somethin' else.
Ah, it's nae bother. We're all here ta see tha same thing, aye?
Y'alright love?
Haud oan a minute. Isn't Alessandro Caglistro meant tae be some auld guy from th' [placeholder] region? Ye dinnae look like some auld magician.
placeholder
placeholder
placeholder
Oh, a tie. Dunnae see that ev'ry day, do ya?
Micro game? What kinda boofin' name is that?
Micro game? Noo that's a dumb name if a've ever heard one.
What the bloody hell...
I'll be waitin' for ya as soon as I find all of my cares. I think I've misplaced 'em.
Ooh, yeah. Did ye, aye? Very cool.
... Alright, get on with it then.
Are you havin' a laugh, mate?
Oo, aye. Y've got me wet now, mate.
Careful now, lad. You're positively radiatin' sex appeal right now.
Bloody brilliant! How'd you come up with that one, then?
... I dunnae knoo, and I dunnae care.
Gonna whittle you down, one thing at a time, mate!
Sorry, lass, but ah just don't care enough tae listen. Water this, water that...
Ah, well. At least ye can still give a one-handed handy, right?
Ah'm sure a guy will still be good tae go wit' only a one-handed handy, aye?
Oh, bloody hell. She's practically retchin' nothin' but facts at this point. Someone give 'er a slap, right quick!
C'mon, lass. I've nae got ten years ta kill.
Hmm. Alright, then.
I'm fetchin' ta die of boredom, here.
Nae point squirmin'. ~clothing.ifPlural(They're|It's)~ only a wee bit of damage.
Alright, let's move oan before I fall asleep.
Ah'd be more interested in hearin' what a Blipbug has ta say.
Yer lucky y've got such a cute face, ~name~. Otherwise I'd be right bored now.
I'm ready fur the next round! Let's git a move on, already!
A'right, that's baw. Ah wasn't interested anyway.
If ah was two pints in, this'd be gaun a lot quicker.
Tis nae like ah wanted ye ta git naked fur me or anythin', ya eejit.
It's either this, or ah wander five feet 'n' hae tae listen tae whitevur caught Hop's yak again.
Uh... I didnae see where they went. Doya need help lookin'?
Noo ye look lik' a laddie who's really lost something.
Tis lik' a wee pinch o' lemon in a curry. Doesn't add much but flavour.
Ah should remember tae use mah Poké Mart club card more often. Ah keep leavin' it back home.
Hmm...
Aha! She turned hersel' into a Grookey! Funniest shite I've e'er seen! Ahaha!
What the bloody heady hell is goin' on here?!
These wild things sound right serious. But how d'ye catch 'em? Do'ya use special PokéBalls or what?
Alright, these Grimm sound hardcore. How do d'ye catch 'em? Do'ya need special PokéBalls fer em, or will normal ones do fine?
Okay, but how d'ye catch 'em? Do'ya use special PokéBalls or what?
Alright, these Grimm, do d'ye catch 'em? Do'ya need special PokéBalls fer em, or will normal ones do fine?
She's goin' all-in on takin' her armor off... Lass, y'know it's fair game if ye want tae pace yerself, right?
A'right, that's baw. Ah wasn't hoping fur much anyhoo.
I'll just keep mah eyes open fur somethin' baw, then.
Ken we speed oan through this, or is it gonnae take a while?
Us girls are gowan pure mild to~background.time~!
Ah'm not tae worried either way. Dae whit you want tae do.
Movin' with all th' grace o' an auld lassie, there.
I'll take ya round t' Wedgehurst sometime, maybe the lab gals kin do research intae how to be an interestin' player.
Think ye can help a lassie out?
If ye want tae teach me how tae play th' game properly, a demonstration is in order.
This'll add a wee bit o' spice tae this plain rice dish.
Knoo how tae show a free lassie a good time, hmm?
Think ye can help a lassie out?
Please, show me how a real gent does it, ~name~.
This'll add a wee bit o' much needed flavour.
I'm desperate fer ye t' show me a good time, pal. Don't waste this chance.
We're gettin' oan t' the grand finals here, folks.
Dinnae let me down, pal. A've been waiting fur a chance like this.
Just a wee bit more...
Now that's a proper show of it. That's swell.
Ye'r nae scared o' a tough, young Galarian lassie, are ye?
